name: ChatGPT
description: OpenAI's flagship chatbot powered by GPT-4. Great all-rounder for conversation, writing, coding, and analysis. The most widely used AI assistant.

name: Claude
description: Anthropic's AI assistant known for nuanced understanding, long context, and thoughtful responses. Excellent for complex analysis and writing.

name: Google Gemini
description: Google's AI assistant integrated with Google services. Good for research and works well with Gmail, Docs, and Search.

name: Microsoft Copilot
description: Microsoft's AI assistant built into Office 365, Edge, and Windows. Best for users already in the Microsoft ecosystem.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI pair programmer that suggests code as you type in your IDE. Dramatically speeds up coding with smart completions.

name: Midjourney
description: Leading AI image generator known for artistic, high-quality visuals. Accessed through Discord. Great for creative projects.

name: DALL-E 3
description: OpenAI's image generator integrated into ChatGPT. Easy to use with natural language prompts. Good for illustrations and concepts.

name: Perplexity
description: AI-powered search engine that provides sourced answers. Great for research with citations and less hallucination.

name: Notion AI
description: AI writing assistant built into Notion. Great for note-taking, writing, and organizing information in Notion workspaces.

name: Grammarly
description: AI writing assistant focused on grammar, clarity, and style. Works across browsers and apps to improve your writing.

name: Cursor
description: AI-powered code editor built for pair programming with AI. Full IDE with deep AI integration for serious developers.

name: Otter.ai
description: AI transcription and meeting notes. Records meetings, transcribes in real-time, and generates summaries.

name: Canva AI
description: Design tool with AI features for generating images, writing copy, and creating presentations. No design skills needed.

name: Jasper
description: AI writing tool focused on marketing content. Templates for ads, emails, blogs, and social media posts.

name: Whisper
description: OpenAI's speech recognition model. Highly accurate transcription that runs locally or via API. Free and open source.

name: Replit AI
description: AI coding assistant in a browser-based IDE. Great for learning to code and building quick projects without setup.
